Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment:
I chose to merge a patch by jj instead which he sent to me via email privately (I told him to not do that in the future :)). That patch fixes the issue in a better way, IMO.

Thanks anyway!

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: A part of why I'm fixing bugs like this is to get credentials. Since I'm new to the project, and to programming in C, I am going to be off sometimes. However, I would like some credit when I contribute substantially to a bug fix, even if its just a thanks in the commit message.
